Item ID21126

A ring of pursuit is an opal ring enchanted via the Lvl-1 Enchant spell.

When equipped, there is a 25% chance to reveal the entire track of hunter creatures (excluding herbiboars) caught via noose wand. The ring will provide 10 charges before disappearing. If the ring does not activate, you may try re-logging or world switching to reset the tracks and try again. This trick may speed up hunting significantly.
